DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical radiographic outcome socket shield technique compare conventional immediate implant placement .
DOC.brief_title: : SOCKET SHIELD TECHNIQUE VERSUS EMPTY SOCKET TECHNIQUE
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate clinical radiographic outcome socket shield technique compare conventional immediate implant placement . PICO - P : patient require immediate dental implant placement esthetic consideration - I : socket shield technique - C : conventional immediate implant placement - O : Outcome name Measuring device Measuring unit Primary outcome Vertical horizontal bone level Cone beam Computer Tomography ( CBCT ) Millimeter Secondary outcome ( ) Pocket probe depth Periodontal probe Millimeter Secondary outcome ( b ) Labial Alveolar crestal bone height compare lingual side Cone beam Computer Tomography ( CBCT ) Millimeter
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients remain root esthetic zone intact periodontal condition indicate extraction . 2 . Physically able tolerate conventional surgical restorative procedure 3 . Signing informed consent form 4 . Implant insertion torque > 32 N cm good primary stability 1 . Systemic disease contraindicate implant placement eg uncontrolled diabetes 2 . Severe bruxism 3 . Active infection teeth treat 4 . Vertical root fracture displacement teeth surgical area
